attributes.action: ask the Department of Transport to draw up legislation to allow women drivers to use the near side lane.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Women drivers on dual carriageways and motorways are invariably to be seen driving in the outer or centre lane.  This results in a serious hazard and creates unnecessary congestion.  It also means that there is a danger of undertaking and can force truck drivers to overtake in the outer lane on motorways.  A new rule is required to allow women to use the inside lane.  Maximum publicity to the new rule should be given .
